resources.string: "I'll help you skip the first screen AD"

Please read carefully and fully understand the terms of the "Privacy Policy", including but not limited to:
 In order to be able to provide services to you, we need to use accessibility features. 
 Use Accessibility to get:
 1. Open/close applications, page switching and other actions. 
 2. Read the text of the application page. 
 Use Accessibility to do:
 1. Perform a click action. 

 Disclaimer: All consequences of using this app to perform operations on behalf of the user are the responsibility of the user.
Click %s in \"Downloaded apps\" and enable it.
